channel.title: Research on Matthew DeHaven
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Matthew DeHaven

item.title: Identifying Financial Crises Using Machine Learning on Textual Data
item.description: Using text analyis on OECD Economic Outlooks to nowcast and forecast economic crises.

item.title: The Global Recovery: Lessons from the Past
item.description: The COVID-19 recesion is extremely severe compared to past recessions, but perhaps there is evidence that the recovery will also be steep.
